txt.en: The bounty notice reads:\n\nReward offered to any individual that puts down the bog-lurker dubbed 'Drâghru'. This dangerous creature is unusually large and aggressive. It has been determined to be a threat to the people of Umbar Baharbêl that must be dealt with. See Nashôn to collect this bounty.
Drâghru can be found in Ilmabiri; the Wells, west of the guard post Kruha-sûrja.
You have defeated Drâghru. You should return to Nashôn in Kruha-sûrja to report your success.
A bounty has been offered by Nashôn for the defeat of the bog-lurker called Drâghru.
'Ah, you have defeated the infamous Drâghru? Thank you! Here is some coin for your trouble.'
